Q14_W3. Summary Table: COP28 is the 28th UN Climate Change Conference taking place in Dubai in November 2023. This summit will bring key parties together from around the world to work on accelerating action to address climate change. Thinking about the COP28 conference, to what extent do you agree or disagree with each of the following statements?
There is not enough support for action to tackle climate change in other countries around the world
It will make the general public more aware of climate change
I'm worried that anything that comes out of it will be too late
It will raise climate change up the international agenda
I don't think anything meaningful will come out of it
It will motivate me to take more personal action to combat climate change
It will lead to real actions and positive change
I don't believe action needs to be taken to address climate change
